It is characterized by its distinctive, elongated, club-shaped leaves that are often covered in a dense layer of fine hairs. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pale green or yellowish in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in cloud forests or under the canopy of dense vegetation.
